acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Entering the world of Bad Parenting means you accept all our terms. There's no turning back, only moving forward.

userBehavior.title: User Behavior
userBehavior.content: In this twisted world, every choice you make will have consequences. We are not responsible for your actions, but remember, the Red-Faced Man is always watching.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Bad Parenting may cause strong emotional reactions and psychological discomfort. We are not responsible for any nightmares, insomnia, or psychological shadows players may experience due to the game content.

modification.title: Modification of Terms
modification.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, just as the Red-Faced Man might appear in your nightmares at any moment. Continued use of this game indicates your acceptance of any changes.
